abstract:
Fuzzy graph is now a very important research area due to its wide application.
Fuzzy planar graph is an important subclass of fuzzy graph theory. In this paper, we define
the fuzzy combinatorial dual graph which is very close association with the fuzzy dual graph.
The fuzzy combinatorial dual graph is defined and derived some of the results.
meta: October 2016International Journal of Pure and Applied Mathematics 109(7):35-41
